name: The Shop (BrynAngell)
description:
You are being watched by your manager at work, clean up as much as you can before the shop closes so your manager can tell you how well you have done, try to get a high score so you keep your job at the shop! Controls - 
  • WASD/Arrow Keys = Walk 
  • Shift = Run
  • Mouse = Look
  • Left Mouse = Pick Up
Info -
  • Pick up the items and place them in the bin in the back room to gain points
  • Different items will give you a different amount of points
  • The items that you can pick up are the toilet paper, mini cars, balls and trash bags, everything else is meant to be where it is
  • Works best if in Fullscreen or if you Download
Comment your score Music by - 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCG1G2FcKNXgcnggB-NAeroA
